1130860.name: Music Maker 2020 Halloween Edition
1130860.description:
Produce music with frightening ease

Produce your own creepy Halloween songs with the brand-new Music Maker 2020 Halloween Steam Edition.
Build your own beats with a massive range of sounds and loops from the most popular genres, play your own melodies using virtual instruments and the mouse, keyboard or MIDI keyboard and record your own vocals or instruments. Drag & drop to edit recordings with professional effects or use flanger and chorus to achieve creepy vocal distortion.With a new customizable user interface, a new design, improved MIDI editing functions as well as a newly optimized arranger, you can let your creativity run free. Make each and every one of your musical ideas a reality and easily produce songs for your next Halloween party!

Create the right sound for any occasion

Produce music the easy way, both before and after Halloween!
Add to your song sketches using thousands of new sounds, instruments and features.
Whether horror movie sound effects or popular genres like trap, EDM, house, hip-hop and techno, our in-app Store contains all the latest Soundpools and lots more content.

Music Maker 2020 Halloween Edition

  • Simple drag & drop controls
  • Combine sounds & loops
  • Virtual instruments and high-quality effects
  • MIDI editing & audio recording
  • In-app Store with thousands of new sounds, features and instruments
  • Get the latest Music Maker version updates for free
1130860.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙
